content.detailedDescription: Saw one green-white light, brighter and slightly larger than star while in hot tub on porch. light flashed from green-white to dark to dull red to dark, then back to green-white. this pattern continued throughout the sighting. my mother pointed the object out to my father and i, as it was too low and flying at too sharp an upward angle to be a plane. object ascended quickly at angle of at least 80 degrees, came to a stop after about 30 seconds, and hovered for about 30 seconds, before making several sharp directional changes at slow speed, then assumed a straight path for about 2 minutes until it went past my roof line, and i went inside.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighted from porch at home, glowing light in sky flashed from bright green-white to dull red, hovered, ascended at sharp angle, then straight path.

content.detailedDescription:
First, i have never reported a ufo sighting before, nor have i ever seen what i believed to be a ufo. i am 65 years old and am a retired agricultural scientist. i am not an avid star-gazer but i do enjoy watching the night sky on clear nights. i can identify at least 3 constellations--the big dipper, the small dipper (hard to see anymore), and orion's belt.

i took my dog for a potty break out onto our south lawn at 6:05 pm on dec. 28, 2016. i live in a residential neighborhood in which the houses are fairly widely separated. street lights are minimal and there is essentially no vehicle traffic on the street next to my house. stars in the sky were clearly visible. the city lights dim the brightness of the stars mainly looking north from my house but the south sky is quite dark. during the time i viewed the object, the moon was not visible. the sky was mostly clear (many visible stars) with perhaps a few high clouds. there was no wind.

i saw the object almost immediately. it was in the southwest sky, probably 25-35 degrees from vertical, and i am guesstimating that it was 1000-2000 feet in elevation. it appeared to be about the size of mid-sized airplane (10-20 passengers). what caught my attention was the motion of the object. i watched it for about 30 seconds and it made no directional movement. it appeared to be mostly hovering, but it frequently made small almost random movements (almost what you would see an airborne gnat do). also, it made no noise.

i could not definitely discern the outline of a solid object but i sensed the object was solid and my best guess is that it was oval in shape. the most prominent feature was 2 distinct white lights. i believe there were 2 smaller red lights to the outside of each white light, but they were less distinct. the white lights for the most part were constant in brightness and not noticeably flickering or pulsating.  the lights appeared to give off a halo effect and also seemed to produce a slight beam (like headlights). i watched this object for about 10 minutes initially. at one point the lights nearly disappeared. this occurred over a 5-10 second period. it was not a gradual dimming. instead, it looked like a candle that is about to go out because it is running out of fuel (oxygen). but then the lights, when about totally out suddenly came back on. 

i watched this object for approximately 10 minutes. no one else was outside with me to verify what i saw. i then went inside for 10-15 minutes. when i went back outside the object was still there, except that it appeared 2-3 times farther away, slightly closer to the horizon but in the same direction. the only visible light was what appeared to be a single white light. it was still 3-4 times brighter than any star and also at least 2-4x larger. it was randomly changing in intensity--would almost disappear then appear very bright again. the motion was the same as before. this time i watched the object for another 5 minutes (approx. 6:30 to 6:35) and then went back inside. i went back outside at 7:15 and the object was still where it was at 6:30 and its lights and motion were as before. i went back inside to make this report while the details of what i saw were still fresh in my mind.

i am not suggesting this was some type of alien craft. it was not the moon, nor a star, nor a planet. it was not a normal plane or helicopter. i am not sure what it was. i would like to know.
content.summary: Watched hovering object for 10 minutes; 2 prominent white lights, 2 smaller red lights; once lights slowing went off then quickly back on

content.detailedDescription: Saw white +2 mag pseudo-star object moving from n to ne, in the constellation perseus. i was outside walking my dog after dark. i always look up at the stars when outside, and have seen many pseudo-stars in my area for the past two years. noticed the object moving quickly. i waived orange light at it, it saw me, stopped, reversed direction and followed me home several blocks (moved about 100 degrees across the sky). hovered over my home until i went inside. (i went inside because the objects never leave as long as i am outside. i no longer linger since i have a scary history with these objects, and just now have decided to report them.) the object moved at high airplane level (best guess). altitude usually very high, but respond to orange light from the ground. took photo from cell phone (hard to see), could not see object in photo until i enlarged it. have many better dslr photos of similar objects which leave a light trail on multiple second exposures, but no trails in sky. enlarged photo shows craft of some sort. craft was log-like. objects move quickly and slowly, can turn in any direction. pseudo-star luminosity appears linked to velocity: white when moving fast, orange-red-gray when hovering. look like most other stars in the sky, except they don't twinkle, and they move!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw object moving n to ne, waived orange light at it, it stopped, reversed, and followed me several blocks, then hovered high up over my house. looked like white +2 mag star. responded to my movements of orange light. 204th siting in my area.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband is a long-haul truck driver and we were on a run from washington state to albuquerque, new mexico. left the town of beatty, nv. heading south on sr 95 when i spotted 3 glowing objects to the west over the hills. my husband pulled over and we observed the objects just hover above the hills. they stayed in one spot for about 15-20 minutes. my husband thought they were military flairs. i say that they are ufo's. we took pictures and watched them just hover there the whole time. then they disappeared without any noise at all.
          the next day outside boulder city, nv. approx. 6am we videoed 15 black helicopters flying in the direction of where we saw the objects the night before.
content.summary: Headed south leaving betty n.V. and spotted 3 glowing objects to the west above the hills.Pulled over and took pictures.We watched them for approx.15 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: It was january, two friends and i were headed back from town in(sequim, wa),to their home out by  the strait of juan de fuca. i was in the passenger seat of an early 80s white ford pickup that had a canopy. we were driving along side grays marsh farms when i realized that i was gazing out the window at a green ball of light. it was pacing us perfectly, and was about 30 -40 feet from us at about 25-30 ft. off the ground. it was about 4 ft. in diameter in my opinion (i am a carpenter by trade). it was like staring at a green moon, and gave out its own light, not hard to look at. at some point i turned around and started looking around the vehicle for a green light that might be reflecting off the inside of the window. as if prompted by me looking away the object moved out in front of us into the other witnesses view. they apparently couldn't see it at the height it was at outside my window. my buddy who was driving yelled "what the hell is that?!" as i turned around to look, the object had advanced out in front of the truck, but still over the farm property. the large orb was on the other side of some wind break trees that bordered the road, but our view was unobstructed due to no leaves on the trees. the driver punched it to catch up with the object, but as we increased in speed the object did as well. we were rapidly approaching the end of the road, where it turned at a 90 and paralleled the strait. in the next moment the object took off at a speed so great it left a line in the sky that was still visible even after we had screeched to a stop at the water. we got out of the truck and just stared as the line slowly disappeared. we never talked about it after that night. it's funny now, because when i hear people talk about there being life "out there", i now have no doubts. one thing i left out is at some point i had rolled down the window to see better once the object had moved out in front of us, and i remember hearing nothing but the truck. whatever the object was doing, it had to have an "intelligence" behind it. to pace us so perfectly for so long, i will never forget it. i have never written about this experience until now, but remember it as if it were yesterday.
content.summary: Large green orb that paced us as we drove, only about 30 ft away

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Watching the weather cams again on 12/27/2016. pictures of many different sizes and shapes. jandakot airport ne and ssw directions.
content.summary: Watching jandakot airport weather cams.

content.detailedDescription: See case# 78345.
content.summary: Was unable to go back and edit original case# 78345 so added this one to post pics.

content.detailedDescription: On oct. 13, 2016 i witnessed several objects flying at a low altitude with what appeared to be contrails. at first they appeared to be jets but the movement of the craft was far too irregular to those of jets and also seemed to be at too low of an altitude. for those who are not aware, it is literally impossible for any craft, at least known to us, to produce any contrails. the best way i can explain it is that craft were making maneuvers that seemed too sharp at close quarters. on top of that, the main object that brought up this curiosity was what appeared to be a cigar metallic shaped object just simply hovering in mid air. the amount of craft that i had seen on this particular date was 7. 6 small craft which, again, appeared to be jets, but then the large cigar shaped craft equalling 7. now, the photos that are uploaded do not depict the cigar shaped object, but instead depict another craft which i assumed was a jet. but, upon further investigation by sending in a foia request to investigate what i had seen, the faa reported back that there was no activity in the skies on that particular date nor the time that i had suggested. a copy of all findings and requests made is uploaded into this case. my purpose of submitting this is to see what other people think as well as what the experts believe it could be. it is possible i may have gotten 2 crafts in a couple of the pictures, however i think one of the potential crafts is just a bug that got in the frame. one other thing, as i mentioned before, i saw 7 total craft. of the 7, 6 appeared to be jets, but before they appeared to be solid objects, i witnessed them as simply white dots. it is possible they could have been stars and  i was just seeing jet aircraft, but in the pictures, especially the really zoomed in picture, you can very faintly make out a few white dots. if i could get a possible answer as to whether those are just stars/planets i picked up or if they could be objects, that would also be appreciated. i look forward to finding out what is found during this investigation. thank you
content.summary: Several objects flying with 1 hovering

content.detailedDescription: Doing security rounds at work .Did not match the normal star formations.Orange balloon.It was like a string of balloons following each other,they was to high to be balloons and i had never seen all the balloons looking the same.They where headed north the wind on ground was blowing east? just amazed then puzzled there was no signs of danger,
content.summary: Saw at least 10 orange orbs,disks going north in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: It was august 15t, 2016  at 10:52 pm, and i was taking a short walk to the gas station for some snacks. i was in a parking lot, with a basketball court right in the distance. i should note that i felt particularly good at that time, maybe even at the moment. the moon looked beautiful that night so i grabbed out my iphone 5s camera and snapped 3 pictures. 2 were taken with no flash and one with the flash on. 4 months later i go back to inspect the photos when i noticed that there three odd looking lights in a shape of a saucer above the moon. when i snapped the pictures i wasn't aware of any ufos in the area. i didn't notice anything out of the ordinary. only upon inspecting the photos did i notice the strange green lights in the sky above the moon. when you zoom in on the lights, it is almost as if you can see shapes of what might be the occupants inside. the photo wth the flash on is the one where you can almost clearly make out a saucer shape and the three lights. i speculated that the two without the flash show the "ufo" at more of a distance while the photo with the flash on shows the ufo more close up.
content.summary: Meant to take pictures of moon, months later discovered ufo like lights in photo above moon

content.detailedDescription: On third floor balcony that faces due west smoking a cigarette. a white atop a red flashing light appeared to be a star, they flashed one then the other- white, red, white, red. then i thought a plane, but the lights were not side-by-side, and the lights seemed to be stationary and were for about a minute. i still thought plane but then the star-like flashing moved quickly a short type distance to the south-east. it seemed to then move in a straight line, but faster than a plane would move, especially a plane that far away to appear to be a star. the lights were very dynamic as well. brilliant, clear and distinct flashing one atop the other with no green to be seen. the light slightly changed course again and then went pretty much in a straight line until it went below the tree line. no feelings felt, but; did note that about a year ago i saw a much different anomaly in the same trajectory. so i guess one could say i feel the irony. i observed the anomaly then came straight inside to file this report. i believe in ebe's and their crafts, or vessels, but i never thought i would observe either; and certainly not twice. like last time, i tried to explain away what i was seeing but in each case the behavior of the anomaly suggests something other than what one would normally see in the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flashing red and white lights 1 atop the other. looked like a star. hovering then erratic pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just set up camp about a mile down from the rim of the canyon.  we had a fire going and had started making dinner.  i noticed five luminous spheres that appeared to be "floating" just below the ridge and pointed them to my wife as i grabbed my binoculars. i told her it looked like someone was "spotlight hunting". three of them floated out towards us but kept in the sky.  the other two began to move down towards us just above the pinion/juniper trees.  i could see that there was no vehicle, just these luminous spheres moving towards us.  as fast as we could get in the truck, we did, leaving all our gear there.  when we reached the top of the canyon, we saw several objects that appeared to vibrate rapidly and moved horizontally.  green and red body and what looked like a white tube attached to the bottom. for some reason i had the feeling it was sucking up something. we saw several of these during the drive to the paved road.  just as we got to asphalt, we saw a small glowing red sphere off the side of the road,  i stopped about 40 feet after i drove past it and had my wife shine the spotlight on it while i looked at it through my binoculars.  when she turned the light on, it sort of exploded into 4 or 5 pieces.  my wife yelled that something was coming over the hill behind us, to get moving.  i looked in my rear view mirror to see a large luminous object directly behind us.  i took off as fast as my truck would go.  it was 10 miles to highway 666, between monticello and cortez, then another 10 miles to the highway patrol station outside of monticello.  the object kept behind and above us until we reached the lights of the checking station.  i pulled up to the station and ran in to tell them what had happened.  they said a trucker had come through a couple of weeks before that night and told them a "helicopter"
 was harrassing him but when he slowed down to stop, the object came along the side of his truck then "disappeared".
the highway patrol called the sheriff dept. and both of them followed us out to where we had camp set up.  of course, there were no lights, nothing !
we gathered our gear and planned to sleep somewhere very near the highway patrol station then drive the 350 miles home the next day.
at about 10 the next morning, we woke up sitting in the front of my truck about 1 mile from where we left our gear the night before.
my wife asked if remember telling her to wake up and look at the doe that was looking at us through the windshield.
content.summary: My wife and i encountered objects that were under intelligent control

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down 627 on december 26 & saw chemtrails in the sky i snapped two different photographs and in the second photograph there was a blueish-green sphere.
content.summary: i was driving start my phone out the window took a photograph of chem trails and this blue-green sphere appeared in the photo

content.detailedDescription:
1. i just happened to be watching by chance a posted video clip on the internet of a highly modified race car with a j85 jet engine from a f5 usaf "tiger" aircraft. i had been watching other dragstrip facing online.
 
2. the video demonstration clip of the dragstrip pass was around sunset and less than 3 minutes. just near the end, i noticed a blur of yellow light flash across the screen about 10-15 feet above the track and spectators. it struck me as odd because something moving  did not seem like lens glare or sunlight, which was fading quickly. 

3. i had no idea what it was at first. however, i have seen film clips of wwii "foo fighter" type fireballs and read about them in widely sighted in various books and articles.

4. this yellow fireball had a distinct aura around the orb, which comes into the video frame from left to right for just 2 seconds (2:42-2:44 on screen). start/stopping the film clip quickly on my pc during those brief 2 seconds captures the sighting clearly for detailed analysis. 

at first the yellow fireball object is a blur, however, it quickly brightens and sharpens into clearer focus moving across the screen bobbing up and down slightly as the film pans (from a fixed position, like a tripod) slowly back to the starting area of the drag race track. 

the yellow fireball orb with a surrounding aura again appeared to also move up and down in elevation slightly, but at a speed faster than the video operator was slowly panning right. it either dimmed in light emitted going out of the video clip frame or seemed to dissolve from view.
  
5. i was a bit stunned that this may have been a ufo/uap fireball type sighting. i have never sighted one before unaided and certainly unexpectedly. after getting good looks in stop action across the two second interval, i watched the event several more times and have access to the online film clip.

6. the film clip of this jet car acceleration demonstration on a dragstrip ended just a few seconds after the fireball left went out of sight off of the right part of the frame. this was a filmed public event and i was not present at the drag strip to see this sighting.
content.summary: Yellow fireball in oppisate direction above rivanazzano dragway after a usaf jet car run 9-14-14.

content.detailedDescription: As a sceptical, but open person i have questioned the existence of extra terrestrials. who wouldn't? in the last 2 weeks since, we will call it "my incident"; i have watched numerous documentaries on ufos, sightings, and encounters. i wanted to know more to know if i could have possibly even saw anything. i live in a small town in ohio. quiet, low profile and nothing to brag about. no stories have ever floated around (that i am aware of) of ufos or sightings in my area. i live on the edge of the town. right around the corner from me is the railroad track, and some small patches of trees. with nothing out of the ordinary about the area. i was standing on my back porch (treeline in front of the railroad is visible to me)smoking a ciggarette. i looked at the trees, i often do. but something was not right. a dark patch of trees cought my eye. my ciggarette was out at this point but everything in my body told me not to move, to keep looking. i watched for a minute and nothing seamed to out of place, the trees just seamed " darker" i turned to go in and right as i did i felt,i don't know how to explain. hmm a lot of energy maybe? i don't know. just lifted maybe. like my body was still but i was weightless. who knows. but i saw what seamed to be a giant mirror kinda triangular but kind of round (dosent make sence to me neither) sit on the top of the trees for what seamed to me minutes. i was in awe, so it most likely wasn't that long. then it was gone. i say mirror because it seamed to reflect to me. like, it was hard to determine if i was seeing the shapes my eyes saw because it still looked like what i see from my porch every day. (crazy i know) it didnt "take off" into the sky. either it was just gone, invisible, or it moved so fast i didn't even see it leave. it was just gone. the feeling i felt in the moment i first cought the glimpse was gone. at this point i was just like, what the f***! i didn't jump to a conclusion on what i saw, i just thought that "maybe" a ufo could be what i saw. after watching all these things, interviews, findings, my "experience" didn't sound as far fetched as what i thought it did. i looked up a site to report it anonymously. whatever it was, i believe it was coming off the ground, who knows how long it may have been there? it's whatever. all i know is that my feelings were so intense in the moment and my mind has constantly thought of it since it happened. i have had a hard time sleeping. i really was not "scared" in the moment, but the more i think about it the creepier it feels and i'm a little uneasy. what if they saw me see? whoever it was. i don't know. i thought maybe if i told someone, it wouldn't weigh my mind as much.
content.summary: I only saw an object come out the tree line, sit a few minutes, maybe 2 and go into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Last several evenings i've been at golf range. first time noticed light is when i hit a high ball. noticed light and it felt out of place and i felt suspicious of it. i noticed object for the two hours i was at range. it didn't move, had no sound but pulsated and got larger and smaller but, remained stationary. there are several planes and helicopters that fly in area but this is not one of them. next evening i came to range and saw same object for the hour and a half i was hitting balls. the third afternoon i came to range and it was still daylight and i purposely looked in area i was seeing the object to make sure not something there that i was perhaps missing. there is nothing but, sky. so tonight i came to range and observed same object in same area but it's never in same spot. i pointed out to friends and it freaked them out after watching it for over an hour so i decided ro report it.
content.summary: Past several nights see same object in same area stationary in sky pulsating for long periods of time.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette noticed how bright the stars were tonight at 655pm and an orange light caught my eye i looked to the left and there was 3 vertical orange lights almost like a boomerang. the lights were very clear traveling slowly i told my boyfriend to get my phone for pictures but as he came back out they slowly disappeared.
content.summary: 3 orange lights slowly moving then stopped started again and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was ate home, and listen a very strange noise, i go out side and i saw a silver shine disc, hovering up in the sky, direct over the house, i observed the ufo for a very long time what is strange about this, the disc do not run, stays there for i dont no , 2 hours and then was gone i didn t know whath the thing was but now i know. thank u mufon.
content.summary: I saw a silver shine disc hovering over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my bicycle, as i came to a corner on the top of a small bank something decended. i felt very foggy, as i got closer to this ( what i can only describe as a mirror like object that seemed to bend the scenery) descended and, it came from maybe 40ft above me to the north east it began to glow a very bright blue. i was not alarmed by it. it came towards me slowly, and the closer it came the brighter it got. i reached out and tried to touch it, but all i felt was a sind of static, and as it pulsated the static got more intense. then i heard a voice in my mind that wasn't my own, it sounded like a female voice and very soft in tone. the voice said they had ben watching me for a while, the voice then went on to tell me that they would be coming back to visit me again but never said when. i asked in my own voice in my mind who they were, the voice then said they are like us but in a blue avian form and in my mind i could see a profile of what they must look like. the voice then went on to say that next time i will be given instructions on something to build, but for now i shold wait for their next appearance. i asked when i shold expect them, and the voice said in time we will be here again. i then felt the static charge starting to fade and with that the sphere that was very bright started to fade and warp the what i can only describe as the night light again until it ascended and completely disappeared again. that is what happened today. i know it sounds strange, i am not a fan of the ufo consiracies and i have never really looked into any of it. but this was real and i didnt know where to go other than here. i have sent an email to another agancie with regards to this matter.
content.summary: Blue sphere, talked to me through my own mind. told me they would return.

content.detailedDescription: Was parked on a side street in manchester waiting on a friend when i told my friend to look up about a mile away in the sky a bright yellow light just appeared and started moving south-west we followed untill we lost it over the rooftops it was no plane or anything i would recognise it was flashing violet pinks and white light it was gone in about 3 minutes
content.summary: Glowin ball of light flashing white oramge and violet pulsating lighs

content.detailedDescription: Was in driveway and looked up and saw a hovering blue light slightly bigger than a planet.Brighter than a star or planet. was stationary for just over an hour before covered up from fog. no sound.
content.summary: Was in driveway and looked up and saw a hovering blue light slightly bigger than a planet.Brighter than a star or planet. was stationary for just over an hour before covered up from fog. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Inbetween county line road and i94 in racine,wi and 5 minutes south of mars cheese castle off i94 in kenosha,wi. a bright,close greenish-blue (more green than blue) fireball descending 45 degrees south on east side of i94. in air for 10 seconds as i was driving south on ,i94. it was about 200 or so feet away from us descending slowly at about the same speed we were driving appeared out of nowhere was like a fireball and then a tiny piece broke off and it just disappeared appearing crashing into the ground.
content.summary: Bright greenish blue fireball descending at 45 degrees. night sky ,travelled same path as we drove. i94 east to chicago. about 5-10 minutes from mars cheese castle

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room and happened to look out my window and seen a ball of light. just after i noticed the ball of light and started to observe it there was a very loud boom! it shook my whole house and was heard and felt about 3 blocks over. the ball of light then shot to the north of our location at an impossible rate of speed. i felt shocked at first but there was no mistaking this for any aircraft that i have ever seen the ability to hover and then take off at a high rate of speed left me baffled and wanting to learn more. me and my fianc reported the event to our local news only to find at least 30 others who have indeed heard or seen the objects and sounds we have. there has been no official report but we did hear of increased police presents with out explanation a couple blocks from our house. no one will tell us why and everyone ignores all my questions. i an certain that what i seen was not part of this world or at least not part of any technology that has been released to the public. if it was of human origin the occupants of the craft would have pulled to many negative g's and died this object accelerated at a rate i have never seen. i lost sight of the object as it speed away.
content.summary: Seen huge flash of light and heard huge sonic boom

content.detailedDescription: Around 8pm christmas eve we stopped at the beach on palm beach island for a brief moment. in the time between 8-9pm we witnessed a star like light appear far out over the ocean traveling north like an airplane. it was pulsating white, blue, red, orange and was not on a stable path. it then slowed down, and hovered for a brief moment before traveling backwards. once we recognized it was something else, it started dancing in the sky in all directions, speeding and slowing down. the size of a bright star. it disappeared eventually and left us mesmerized.
content.summary: At the beach at night we witnessed a rainbow "star" dancing in the sky over the ocean

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of december 18th (not sure the exact day, it was either the 17,18, or 19th of december 2016) i was driving home from a job that i had started in collingswood,nj. i was on a very busy 3 lane highway, route 130, stopped at a traffic light when i first noticed 3 red glowing objects which seemed to emerge from a strip of trees. the trees were right on the street line, and the objects were extremely low, no more then 10 ft off the ground. i thought it must be some kind of prank, lights attached to balloons by kids for fun, or some kind of toy drones. it wasn't until i was stopped again, at another traffic light that i was able to get my phone out and record what was going on. i have a 2 minute clip i posted to my youtube channel (but i unfortunately cannot figure out how to post to the media attachments below), but i will post a few screens hots from the video, and i am more then happy to give the url link to my video upon request). what i recorded was 3 red orb/plasma light ufos, they appeared to be pure energy, or light. the way they ascended into the sky showed intelligence-two of the orb ufos touch one another and the 3rd, which was lagging behind sped up as the other 2 hovered, eventually passing the 2 that converged on one another. i have recorded many videos of ufos, as i have been ufo/sky hunting for 4 years now. i have not turned anything into mufon, as i was waiting for a video that had undeniable rock solid proof of ufos. i believe i have that proof with this video, as it has silenced every skeptic i've shown it to.. one thing that i may add is a jet plane enters the frame towards the end of the video. this is a topic for another time, but i and many others have video proof that ufos are cloaking themselves somehow, appearing as jet airplanes/helicopters. so theven airplane in the clip very well may also be a cloaked ufo. thank you for your time and please feel free to contact me via email or cellphone regarding my youtube video documenting this event,  or any other questions
content.summary: I captured 3 red orb/plasma light ufos on my ride home from work

content.detailedDescription: i just laid down and was looking at the stars as i do regularly from my bed through a sliding glass door.  i noticed an exceptionally bright (star) become much brighter and started to show colors.  it then made several movements left and right and up and down. it then got closer and i got out of bed and grabbed my binoculars to see better. i then sat on the edge of the bed as my optics were attached to a tripod. i watched for another 5 minutes and woke up my wife who was sleeping soundly. i asked her to look and she agreed with what i saw. i could see a basic shape of disc. it had green and red lighting on either side of a large white light. it quit zigging and zagging and became stationary for another 15 minutes.....I could see the lights clearly with my optics.  i decided to get some sleep and laid back down. i just knew this was no helo or airplane which i see every clear evening.  this was the real thing..Totally convinced here.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering and zipping moving bright multicolored lights shaped like a saucer

content.detailedDescription: My dad was out smoking a cigarette and came inside to get me to look at something he considered strange. when i got outside around 10:15pm local time i saw two lights a little under halfway up in the sky. the lights were red and white at the time. i watched it for several minutes and it would move right to left slowly and go higher in the sky. sometimes it would seem as if it would turn which showed me green and blue lights on the other side. it would take approximately 5-10 seconds for it to move higher in the sky. after several minutes of viewing and realizing this wasn't a helicopter or a plane, i went inside to grab my camera in order to take a long exposure so i could document the movements with a long exposure photograph. about 20 seconds later, i came back outside to see the object had moved all the way across the sky, now lower on the horizon, probably closer to 30 degrees. as i was getting my camera set up it began moving away. it took me a minute or two tops to get the tripod in order and my camera settings set and by then it had gone over the horizon. unfortunately, we have a railroad embankment in our back yard which obstructed our view of the low horizon. however, when i stood on my tail gate i could see that it had stalled over a red light on what i think is a tower. at one point it started to meander back towards us and i thought i'd get a good photograph of it but seconds later it was gone.
content.summary: 4 lights in the sky changing directions.

content.detailedDescription: No sound at all
content.summary: Angular object with several multicoloured search lights. footed about 100ft above and came in from west changed to south

content.detailedDescription: My wife and myself have noticed strange star light objects hovering in the centre of port phillip bay on nearly every monday night for 6 months or so.We have observed these craft from the end of beacon point road clifton springs.This road ends at a cliff face at the waters edge of corio bay which is a bay of port phillip bay.The craft we have observed are always in the same spot and approx 200 mts above the water.The activity that we have observed is very strange and occurs in a cycle.Sometimes we see only 1 star like object then other times 2 or 3.The objects are seen north of the end of beacon point rd looking towards melbourne.Usually after about 5 minutes of the star like object hovering it then moves off in an easterly direction at approx 50 mph.When in motion the star like light then turns into red and green and white flashing around the craft.L have observed these lights through binoculars.All the sightings have happened of a night time so its difficult to give accurate details of size and shape.My guess is the craft l see are about 5 to 7 miles away.When a craft moves off another craft moves into the same posistion and again after 5 minutes or so it also flys off in an easterly direction and so forth.L drive down beacon point rd 4 nights a week usually after 9pm and have not noticed these lights on any other night always a monday night until this last week when l noticed them on a sunday night which was christmas day.This is what has prompted me to file this report if they are simply helicopters on training missions why would they be working on christmas day?If you follow this up lm very keen to hear of the outcome.
content.summary: Hovering bright start light object objects over water then fly off and cycle repeated
